resources:
AndroidAtWork
Overlay permission is required to draw the the UI after phone unlock during Intervention phase #1. Click below to test what the screen looks like.
# ESM on pickup / after continued use Why did you pick up your phone? Please select one option from each row! What are you doing on your phone right now?
Step 1 Examples Step 2: What is the primary purpose of this activity? Step 3 Examples
Communication: Calls, messaging, emails, social networking\n Entertainment/Leisure: Browsing, gaming, news, videos, social media scrolling\n Tools & Utilities: Checking time, calendar, weather, payments, navigation, system settings\n Other/Unconscious Habit: Accidental unlock, habit, etc.
Mainly work-related / Mainly personal / A mix of both (work and personal) / Not applicable (e.g., in the case of “Other” in Step 1)
External Nudge: Notification, Call, Alert, etc. \n Inner Motivation: Thought, Habit, Curiosity, etc. \n No specific reason: accidental activation
Device id: %s
WorkTimeSelectorActivity This application tracks foreground application changes when you are using your smartphone.
